TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class MenuItem : ICloneable, System.Web.UI.IStateManager
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItem extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItem Implements ICloneable, IStateManager
public ref class MenuItem sealed : ICloneable, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type MenuItem = class interface IStateManager interface ICloneable

summary.span: 表示一个在 控件中显示的菜单项。

span.span: Represents a menu item displayed in the control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件所表示的菜单项的层次结构组成对象。A control is made up of a hierarchy of menu items represented by objects. 每个菜单项包含一个只读的属性，用于指定在显示菜单项级别控件。Each menu item has a read-only property that specifies the level at which the menu item is displayed in the control. 在顶层 （级别 0） 不具有父菜单项的菜单项称为根菜单项。Menu items at the top level (level 0) that do not have a parent menu item are called root menu items. 具有父菜单项的菜单项称为子菜单项。A menu item that has a parent menu item is called a submenu item. 所有根菜单项都存储在集合。All root menu items are stored in the collection. 子菜单项存储在父菜单项的集合。Submenu items are stored in a parent menu item's collection. 你可以通过访问菜单项的父菜单项属性。You can access a menu item's parent menu item by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 和集合包含仅下一个级别的菜单项下。The and collections contain only the menu items for the next level down. 若要访问菜单项进一步菜单树向下的，使用的子菜单项的属性。To access menu items further down the menu tree, use the property of a subsequent menu item. 若要创建的菜单项控制，请使用以下方法之一：To create the menu items for a control, use one of the following methods: 使用声明性语法创建静态菜单项。Use declarative syntax to create static menu items. 使用构造函数动态创建的新实例类。Use a constructor to dynamically create new instances of the class. 这些然后可以将对象添加到或集合。These objects can then be added to the or collection. 将绑定到数据源的控件。Bind the control to a data source. 当控件绑定到控件，对象将自动创建对应于数据源中的项。When the control is bound to a control, objects are automatically created that correspond to the items in the data source. 对于其他数据源，对象也会自动创建与匹配的数据源层次结构; 但是，你也必须使用集合来定义指定的绑定关系菜单项绑定之间的菜单项和其相应的数据项目。For other data sources, objects are also automatically created that match the hierarchy structure of data source; however, you must also use the collection to define the menu item bindings that specify the binding relationship between a menu item and its corresponding data item. 在静态菜单或动态菜单中的，具体取决于其级别中显示的菜单项。The menu items are displayed in either a static menu or a dynamic menu, depending on its level. 静态菜单会始终以显示控件。The static menu is always displayed in a control. 默认情况下，在顶层 （级别 0） 的菜单项显示在静态菜单中。By default, the menu items at the top level (level 0) are displayed in the static menu. 可以通过设置静态菜单中显示更多菜单级别 （静态子菜单）属性。You can display additional menu levels (static submenus) within the static menu by setting the property. 菜单比指定的值以更高级别的项 （如果有）属性显示在动态子菜单。Menu items (if any) with a higher level than the value specified by the property are displayed in a dynamic submenu. 动态子菜单显示仅当用户将鼠标指针定位在父菜单项包含动态子菜单。A dynamic submenu appears only when the user positions the mouse pointer over the parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 当用户单击菜单项，控件可以导航到链接的网页或只需将回发到服务器。When the user clicks a menu item, the control can either navigate to a linked Web page or simply post back to the server. 如果设置菜单项的属性，则控件导航到链接页; 否则，它将页面回发到服务器进行处理。If the property of a menu item is set, the control navigates to the linked page; otherwise, it posts the page back to the server for processing. 默认情况下，链接的页面显示在相同的窗口或框架的控件。By default, a linked page is displayed in the same window or frame as the control. 若要在不同的窗口或框架显示链接的内容，请使用属性控件。To display the linked content in a different window or frame, use the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性会影响在控件中的每个菜单项。The property affects every menu item in the control. 若要指定的窗口或框架的各个菜单项，设置属性直接对象。To specify a window or frame for an individual menu item, set the property of the object directly. 每个菜单项包含和属性。Each menu item has a and a property. 值属性显示在控件，而属性用于存储有关菜单项中，任何其他数据如数据传递到与菜单项关联的回发事件。The value of the property is displayed in the control, while the property is used to store any additional data about the menu item, such as data passed to the postback event associated with the menu item. 如果你设置属性，但保留属性未设置，属性自动设置相同的值与属性。If you set the property, but leave the property unset, the property is automatically set with the same value as the property. 反过来也是如此。The opposite is also true. 如果你设置属性，但不是属性，属性自动设置相同的值与属性。If you set the property, but not the property, the property is automatically set with the same value as the property. > [!NOTE] > 同一级别的菜单的菜单项必须每个具有唯一值属性;控件无法区分具有相同的值的不同的菜单项在同一级别。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. 在此方案中，如果用户单击菜单项具有重复的值，则选择菜单中第一个出现的菜单项。In this scenario, if the user clicks a menu item that has a duplicate value, the menu item that appears first in the menu is selected. 若要显示工具提示，用户将鼠标指针在菜单项时，设置项的属性。To display a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item, set the item's property. A控件具有多种不同类型的菜单项。A control has several different types of menu items. 你可以使用下表中的属性来控制不同的菜单项类型 （如字体大小和颜色） 的样式。You can control the style (such as font size and color) for the different menu item types by using the properties in the following table. |菜单项样式属性Menu item style property|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针置于动态菜单项样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个动态菜单项样式设置。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||动态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||当前所选动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||当鼠标指针置于静态菜单项样式设置。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个静态菜单项样式设置。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||静态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu.| ||当前所选的静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 而不是设置的单个样式属性，可以指定应用于根据其级别，通过使用下表中所示的样式集合的菜单项的样式。Instead of setting the individual style properties, you can specify styles that are applied to menu items based on their level by using the style collections shown in the following table. |级别样式集合Level style collections|描述Description| |-----------------------------|-----------------| ||集合对象用于控制的菜单项的样式根据其级别。A collection of objects that control the style of the menu items based on their level.| ||集合为所选根据其级别的菜单项控件的样式的对象。A collection of objects that control the style of selected menu items based on their level.| ||集合对象用于控制子菜单项的样式根据其级别。A collection of objects that control the style of the submenu items based on their level.| 集合中的第一个样式对应于在菜单树中的第一个深度级别的菜单项的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the first depth level in the menu tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于在第二个深度级别菜单树中，依次类推的菜单项的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the second depth level in the menu tree, and so on. 这是最常用于生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一深度的菜单项应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子菜单。This is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用上表中列出的级别样式任何的集合定义的样式控件，这些样式设置替代的各个菜单项样式属性。If you use any of the level style collections listed in the previous table to define the style for the control, these style settings override the individual menu item style properties. 除了自定义菜单项的样式，你还可以自定义其外观。In addition to customizing a menu item's style, you can also customize its appearance. 可以通过下表中设置的属性指定自定义映像的菜单项的不同部分。You can specify custom images for the different parts for a menu item by setting the properties in the following table. |映像属性Image property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||显示文本的菜单项旁边的可选图像。An optional image displayed next to the text of a menu item.| ||菜单项以指示该菜单项具有动态子菜单中显示的可选图像。An optional image displayed in a menu item to indicate that the menu item has a dynamic submenu.| ||要与其他菜单项隔开的菜单项底部显示的可选图像。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a menu item to separate it from other menu items.| 若要确定是否中当前选定菜单项控制，请使用属性。To determine whether a menu item is currently selected in a control, use the property. 您还可以确定是否菜单项绑定到数据使用属性。You can also determine whether a menu item is bound to data by using the property. 如果菜单项绑定到数据，则可以使用属性来访问数据项目的值绑定到的菜单项。If a menu item is bound to data, you can use the property to access the values of the data item bound to the menu item. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以填充控件替换为静态对象使用声明性语法。The following example demonstrates how to populate a control with static objects using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/CS/menuitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/VB/menuitemvb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何将绑定控制转移到控件。The following example demonstrates how to bind a control to a control. 当绑定到数据源，控件自动创建对象。When bound to a data source, the control automatically creates the objects. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例站点站点地图数据复制到一个名为 Web.sitemap 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data below to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/CS/menudatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/VB/menudatabindvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class without menu text or a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例而无需菜单文本或值的类。Use this constructor to create a new instance of a class without menu text or a value. > [!NOTE] > 使用此构造函数时中的所有属性对象设置为其默认值。When this constructor is used, all properties in the object are set to their default values. 请务必设置属性，如有必要，创建对象之后。Be sure to set the properties, as necessary, after creating the object. 此构造函数通常用时动态填充集合控件或集合对象。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection of a control or the collection of a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建的新实例类。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 对象然后用于动态填充菜单项在控件。The object is then used to dynamically populate the menu items in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCtorDefault#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCtorDefault/CS/menuitemctordefaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCtorDefault#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCtorDefault/VB/menuitemctordefaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类使用菜单文本、 值、 图像 URL 和指定的导航 URL `text`， `value`， `imageUrl`，和`navigateUrl`参数，分别。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the menu text, value, image URL, and navigation URL specified by the `text`, `value`, `imageUrl`, and `navigateUrl` parameters, respectively. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`text` 参数的值。The value of the `text` parameter.| ||`value` 参数的值。The value of the `value` parameter.| ||`imageUrl` 参数的值。The value of the `imageUrl` parameter.| ||`navigateUrl` 参数的值。The value of the `navigateUrl` parameter.| 此构造函数通常用时动态填充集合控件或集合对象。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection of a control or the collection of a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建的新实例类。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 对象然后用于动态填充菜单项在控件。The object is then used to dynamically populate the menu items in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCtor4Param#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCtor4Param/CS/menuitemctor4paramcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCtor4Param#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCtor4Param/VB/menuitemctor4paramvb.aspx#1)]

param.name: text
param.span: 控件中为菜单项显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed for a menu item in a control.

param.name: value

param.span: 单击菜单项时，显示菜单项所链接到的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the Web page content linked to a menu item when the menu item is clicked.

summary.span: 使用指定的菜单文本、值、图像 URL、导航 URL 和目标初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified menu text, value, image URL, navigation URL, and target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类使用菜单文本、 值、 图像 URL、 导航 URL 和指定的目标`text`， `value`， `imageUrl`， `navigateUrl`，和`target`参数，分别。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the menu text, value, image URL, navigation URL, and target specified by the `text`, `value`, `imageUrl`, `navigateUrl`, and `target` parameters, respectively. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`text` 参数的值。The value of the `text` parameter.| ||`value` 参数的值。The value of the `value` parameter.| ||`imageUrl` 参数的值。The value of the `imageUrl` parameter.| ||`navigateUrl` 参数的值。The value of the `navigateUrl` parameter.| ||`target` 参数的值。The value of the `target` parameter.| 此构造函数通常用时动态填充集合控件或集合对象。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection of a control or the collection of a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建的新实例类。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 对象然后用于动态填充菜单项在控件。The object is then used to dynamically populate the menu items in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCtor5Param#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCtor5Param/CS/menuitemctor5paramcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCtor5Param#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCtor5Param/VB/menuitemctor5paramvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildItems As MenuItemCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含当前菜单项的子菜单项。

span.span: Gets a object that contains the submenu items of the current menu item.

value.span: 对象，包含当前菜单项的子菜单项。

span.span: A that contains the submenu items of the current menu item.

value.span: 默认值是 ，指示菜单项不包含任何子菜单项。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this menu item does not contain any submenu items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性 （集合） 来访问当前的菜单项，这些子菜单项，如果有的话。Use the property (collection) to access the submenu items of the current menu item, if any. 此集合包含的菜单项将在下一步的级别。This collection contains only the menu items at the next level. 若要访问菜单项进一步菜单树向下的，使用的子菜单项的属性。To access menu items further down the menu tree, use the property of a subsequent menu item. 如果属性是`null`，当前菜单不具有任何子菜单项。If the property is `null`, the current menu does not have any submenu items. 属性还可以用于以编程方式管理当前的菜单项的子菜单项。The property can also be used to programmatically manage the submenu items of the current menu item. 可以添加、 插入、 删除、 检索和修改从集合的对象。You can add, insert, remove, retrieve, and modify objects from the collection. 对集合的任何更新将自动反映在控制的下次刷新页面。Any updates to the collection will automatically be reflected in the control the next time the page is refreshed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性遍历菜单中的项控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to traverse the menu items in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItems/CS/menuitemscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItems/VB/menuitemsvb.aspx#1)]

public: property bool DataBound { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示菜单项是否是通过数据绑定创建的。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the menu item was created through data binding.

value.span: 如果菜单项是通过数据绑定创建的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the menu item was created through data binding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于以编程方式确定是否菜单项通过创建数据绑定。The property is used to programmatically determine whether the menu item was created through data binding.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataItem As Object
public: property System::Object ^ DataItem { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取绑定到菜单项的数据项。

span.span: Gets the data item that is bound to the menu item.

value.span: ，表示绑定到菜单项的数据项。

span.span: An that represents the data item that is bound to the menu item.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示菜单项未绑定到任何数据项。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that the menu item is not bound to any data item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，如对象，此属性设置为绑定到此特定菜单项的数据项。When the control is bound to a data source, such as an object, this property is set to the data item that is bound to this specific menu item. 此属性通常用于访问数据项的值。This property is commonly used to access the value of the data item. > [!NOTE] > 仅在数据绑定发生后，此属性才可用。This property is available only after data binding has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataPath As String
public: property System::String ^ DataPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取绑定到菜单项的数据的路径。

span.span: Gets the path to the data that is bound to the menu item.

value.span: 绑定到节点的数据的路径。

span.span: The path to the data that is bound to the node.

value.span: 此值来自 控件绑定到的分层数据源控件。

span.span: This value comes from the hierarchical data source control to which the control is bound.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时，通常使用属性值方法以提供绑定到当前的菜单项的数据的路径。The property value is commonly used when calling the method to provide the path to the data that is bound to the current menu item. 然后，此方法返回对象，其中包含指定路径上的数据。This method then returns a object that contains the data at the specified path.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Depth As Integer
public: property int Depth { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取菜单项的显示级别。

span.span: Gets the level at which a menu item is displayed.

value.span: 菜单项的显示级别。

span.span: The level at which a menu item is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定菜单项的深度。Use the property to determine the depth of the menu item. 深度指示菜单项将显示和表示当前的菜单项和根菜单项之间的层次结构的级别数级别。The depth indicates the level at which a menu item is displayed and represents the number of levels of hierarchy between the current menu item and the root menu item. 例如，根菜单项具有的深度为 0。For example, a root menu item has a depth of 0. 根菜单项的子菜单项具有的深度为 1，依此类推。A submenu item of the root menu item has a depth of 1, and so on. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定菜单项的深度。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the depth of a menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemDepth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemDepth/CS/menuitemdepthcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemDepth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemDepth/VB/menuitemdepthvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 对象是否已启用，如果启用，则该项可以显示弹出图像和所有子菜单项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the object is enabled, allowing the item to display a pop-out image and any child menu items.

value.span: 如果启用菜单项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the menu item is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`false`，菜单项被禁用，并且，该值指示子项目不弹出图像将显示。When this property is set to `false`, the menu item is disabled and no pop-out image indicating child items is displayed. 此属性设置为`false`的菜单项就是使该菜单项的末尾该节点，其中任何进一步的级别会显示从该节点中移出。Setting this property to `false` for a menu item essentially makes the menu item the end of that node, where no further levels are shown off of that node. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. 如果你想要显示的任何子项，但不是会是"可单击"本身，使用的菜单项属性并将其设置为`false`。If you want the menu item to show any child items, but to not be "clickable" itself, use the property and set it to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何菜单项与属性设置为`false`显示和菜单中运行。The following example demonstrates how a menu item with the property set to `false` appears and functions in a menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuSelectableEnabled#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSelectableEnabled/CS/menuselectableenabledcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuSelectableEnabled#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSelectableEnabled/VB/menuselectableenabledvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在菜单项文本旁边的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the text in a menu item.

value.span: 显示在菜单项文本旁边的自定义图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to a custom image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定中的当前菜单项的自定义映像控件。Use the property to specify a custom image for the current menu item in the control. 此图像将显示菜单项文本的旁边，可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。This image is displayed next to the menu item text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来显示文本的菜单项旁边的自定义映像。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display a custom image next to the text of a menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/CS/menuitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/VB/menuitemvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NavigateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NavigateUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击菜单项时要导航到的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to navigate to when the menu item is clicked.

value.span: 单击菜单项时要导航到的 URL。

span.span: The URL to navigate to when the menu item is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 菜单项可以是在两种模式之一中： 选择模式或导航模式。A menu item can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 默认情况下，菜单项处于选择模式。By default, a menu item is in selection mode. 若要将菜单项置于导航模式，设置菜单项的为空字符串以外的值的属性 ("")。To put a menu item into navigation mode, set the menu item's property to a value other than an empty string (""). 在导航模式下的菜单项时，将对该菜单项禁用所选内容的所有事件。When a menu item is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that menu item. 单击导航模式中的菜单项将用户带到指定的 URL。Clicking the menu item in navigation mode takes the user to the specified URL. 你可以选择性地设置属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的链接的内容。You can optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要导航到，当用户单击菜单项的 URL。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to navigate to when the user clicks a menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/CS/menuitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/VB/menuitemvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定父菜单项或访问其属性。Use the property to determine the parent menu item or to access its properties. > [!NOTE] > 根菜单项没有父菜单项。A root menu item does not have a parent menu item. 若要访问当前的菜单项的子菜单项，使用属性。To access the submenu items of the current menu item, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问子菜单项的父菜单项。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the parent menu item of a child menu item. summary.span: 获取或设置显示在菜单项中的图像的 URL，用于指示菜单项具有动态子菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed in a menu item to indicate that the menu item has a dynamic submenu.

value.span: 显示在菜单项中的图像的 URL，用于指示菜单项具有动态子菜单。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed in a menu item to indicate that the menu item has a dynamic submenu.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`List`，或者如果设置为`Default`和设置为`4.0`或更高版本，此属性不起作用。If is set to `List`, or if is set to `Default` and is set to `4.0` or later, this property has no effect. 使用属性或而不是此属性的属性。Use the property or the property instead of this property. 如果设置为`Table`，或者如果设置为`Default`和设置为`3.5`，此属性用于指定显示在菜单项以指示该菜单项具有动态子菜单的自定义映像。If is set to `Table`, or if is set to `Default` and is set to `3.5`, use this property to specify a custom image that is displayed in a menu item to indicate that the menu item has a dynamic submenu. 只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式，此映像可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性重写由指定的映像和属性。Setting this property overrides the image specified by the and properties. 此外可以通过将此属性设置为空字符串，并设置来禁用该图像的静态菜单属性`false`。You can also disable this image in a static menu by setting this property to an empty string and setting the property to `false`. 同样，你可以通过将此属性设置为空字符串，并设置中禁用动态菜单中的此映像属性`false`。Similarly, you can disable this image in a dynamic menu by setting this property to an empty string and setting the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示在菜单项，如果菜单项包含动态子菜单的自定义映像。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display in a menu item when the menu item has a dynamic submenu. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/CS/menuitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/VB/menuitemvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Selectable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 对象是否可选或“可单击”。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the object can be selected, or is "clickable."

value.span: 如果菜单项可选，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the menu item can be selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`false`上一个菜单项，会执行任何操作的菜单项则单击 （或选择）。When this property is set to `false` on a menu item, no action occurs when the menu item is clicked (selected). 如果一个，子菜单项的菜单项，该值指示弹出图像存在，仍然显示并可用。The pop-out image indicating child menu items for the menu item, if one exists, is still shown and available. 如果您不希望任何子菜单项来显示菜单项，设置属性`false`。If you do not want any child menu items to appear for a menu item, set the property to `false`. 仅适用于可以选择，在单击菜单项回发的意义上的菜单项并将该项目设置处于选定状态。 applies only to menu items that can be selected, in the sense that clicking a menu item posts back and sets that item in the selected state. 请注意，不能选择菜单项仍已格式化为链接。Note that a menu item that cannot be selected is still formatted as a link. 这是出于可访问性原因，以便菜单项可能会导致要发生的操作的不同而不同。This is for accessibility reasons, so that the menu item can cause an action to occur. 此外，一个菜单项，即使它不能同时选择，可能具有子菜单项可选择和需要显示。Also, a menu item, even if it cannot be selected, may have child menu items that can be selected or that need to be displayed. 如果你想要阻止的用户单击菜单项，执行以下任一操作：If you want to prevent a user from clicking a menu item, do one of the following: - 未设置并设置到`false`。Do not set and set to `false`. - 设置菜单项的属性`false`。Set the menu item's property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何菜单项与属性设置为`false`显示和菜单中运行。The following example demonstrates how a menu item with the property set to `false` appears and functions in a menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuSelectableEnabled#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSelectableEnabled/CS/menuselectableenabledcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuSelectableEnabled#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSelectableEnabled/VB/menuselectableenabledvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 创建当前 对象的副本。

value.span: 如果控件标记为保存其状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用成员以确定是否对象是否在跟踪视图状态更改。Typically, you should use the member to determine whether a object is tracking view-state changes. 成员是显式接口成员的实现。The member is an explicit interface member implementation. 可以使用它时，才实例被强制转换为接口。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件，调用此方法后属性返回`true`。After this method has been called on a server control, the property returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示菜单项的关联网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item.

value.span: 显示所链接的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的 Web 内容时链接到的菜单项单击该菜单项。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. 值必须以 A 到 Z 范围内的字母（不区分大小写）打头，但某些以下划线打头的特殊值除外，如下表所示：Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. 请注意，设置此属性重写属性此菜单项的控件。Note that setting this property overrides the property of the control for this menu item. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property is rendered as a `target` attribute. `target` XHTML 1.1 严格文档类型定义中不允许对定位标记元素的属性。The `target` attribute on anchor elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 strict document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出必须是 XHTML 1.1 合规。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议你避免使用属性将作为目标另一个窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的 Web 内容时链接到的菜单项单击该菜单项。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemTarget/CS/menuitemtargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemTarget/VB/menuitemtargetvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中显示的菜单项文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the menu item in a control.

value.span: 控件中的菜单项的显示文本。

span.span: The text displayed for the menu item in the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定为中的菜单项显示的文本控件。Use the property to specify or determine the text that is displayed for the menu item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性包含`null`、`get`访问器返回的值属性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果属性，反过来，包含`null`，返回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在每个菜单项中显示的文本控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display in each menu item in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/CS/menuitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/VB/menuitemvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ToolTip : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单项的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for the menu item.

value.span: 菜单项的工具提示文本。

span.span: The ToolTip text for the menu item.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定菜单项的工具提示文本。Use the property to specify the ToolTip text for the menu item. 当鼠标指针位于菜单项时，会显示的工具提示文本。The ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the menu item. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定在每个菜单项的工具提示控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a ToolTip for each menu item in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/CS/menuitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/VB/menuitemvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Value : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个非显示值，该值用于存储菜单项的任何其他数据，如用于处理回发事件的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets a non-displayed value used to store any additional data about the menu item, such as data used for handling postback events.

value.span: 菜单项的补充数据（不会显示在屏幕上）。

span.span: Supplemental data about the menu item that is not displayed.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于补充通过将存储与菜单项关联的任何其他数据的属性。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the menu item. 此值不会显示在控件，通常用于存储用于处理回发事件数据。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性包含`null`、`get`访问器返回的值属性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果属性，反过来，包含`null`，返回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. 值属性还可用于在中指定的值路径时生成属性。The value of the property is also used when the value path specified in the property is generated. 值路径是一个分隔符分隔菜单项值的列表，构成了从根菜单项到当前的菜单项路径。A value path is a delimiter-separated list of menu item values that forms a path from the root menu item to the current menu item. 值路径用于指示的位置中的菜单项控件。The value path is used to indicate the position of a menu item in a control. > [!NOTE] > 同一级别的菜单的菜单项必须每个具有唯一值属性;控件无法区分具有相同的值的不同的菜单项在同一级别。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示菜单项和其父级时用户选择菜单项。The following example demonstrates how to display the for a menu item and its parent when the user selects a menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemValue/CS/menuitemvaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemValue/VB/menuitemvaluevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValuePath As String
public: property System::String ^ ValuePath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取从根菜单项到当前菜单项的路径。

span.span: Gets the path from the root menu item to the current menu item.

value.span: 由分隔符分隔的菜单项值的列表，它构成了从根菜单项到当前菜单项的路径。

span.span: A delimiter-separated list of menu item values that form a path from the root menu item to the current menu item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含构成从根菜单项到当前的菜单项路径的菜单项值的分隔符分隔列表。The property contains a delimiter-separated list of menu item values that form a path from the root menu item to the current menu item. 值路径用于指示的位置中的菜单项控件。The value path is used to indicate the position of a menu item in a control. 你可以指定用于分隔菜单项值使用的分隔符字符属性。You can specify the delimiter character used to separate the menu item values by using the property. 在分析列表的各个值，也可作为参数传递时，通常使用此值方法类。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values, or to pass as an argument to the method of the class. 中显示的值根据控件，分隔符字符可能需要更改以防止任何冲突。Depending on the value displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果设置为逗号分隔符字符，显示的值不能包含任何逗号;否则，你不能准确地分析属性。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed value should not contain any commas; otherwise, you cannot accurately parse the property. > [!NOTE] > 值根菜单项从每个菜单项，当前的菜单项的属性用于生成的值路径。The values of the property of each menu item from the root menu item to the current menu item are used to generate the value path. 同一级别的菜单的菜单项必须每个具有唯一值属性;控件无法区分具有相同的值的不同的菜单项在同一级别。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何分析值赋给各个菜单项值的属性。The following example demonstrates how to parse the value to the property for the individual menu item values. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemValuePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemValuePath/CS/menuitemvaluepathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemValuePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemValuePath/VB/menuitemvaluepathvb.aspx#1)]
